description: Structured prompt templates for the Visual Creation skill. Every field is mandatory — empty fields block council review.
organic_first_reminder: Every template MUST include an organic anchor. Before circuits: fur. Before chrome: wood grain. Before holographic: crystalline growth. Reference: mascot-v05-techno-beast-standing.png

blog-hero.name: Blog Hero Image
blog-hero.description: Wide hero image for blog post headers. Must be visually dense, brand-aligned, and readable at 680px blog width.

subject.description: What this image depicts — specific topic tied to the blog post
subject.example: The architecture of a multi-agent AI orchestration system with 6 specialized teams

organizing_metaphor.description: A physical object or scene that structures the entire composition. NOT 'a futuristic visualization'
organizing_metaphor.example: A Renaissance inventor's observatory with clockwork armillary sphere at center, surrounded by floating instrument stations

style.description: Must be one of the 3 approved styles or sub-variants

viewpoint.example: Dramatic low angle looking up at the central sphere, 30-degree tilt

position.description: Where in the frame this component sits
position.example: Center-left, floating above the main platform

material.description: Tactile material description — what would it feel like?
material.example: Frosted glass sphere with chrome armature bands, warm amber glow from within

organic_anchor.description: The living/organic element that grounds the image. This is the MOST CRITICAL field. Without it, the image will be sterile chrome.
organic_anchor.example: Bioluminescent root network spreading from the base of the central structure, with tiny crystal flowers blooming where roots meet platforms. Soft green (#10B981) glow pulses through root veins like a heartbeat.

foreground.description: Elements closest to the viewer — creates depth
foreground.example: Scattered crystalline fragments and unfurled scrolls with visible text annotations, slightly out of focus

midground.example: The armillary sphere mechanism with 6 orbiting agent stations, each with distinct glowing labels

background.example: Deep navy void (#0f172a) with constellation dot grid and faint nebula wisps in purple (#AB47C7)

atmosphere.example: Warm directional light from upper-left casting long shadows. Floating dust motes caught in light beams. Subtle volumetric fog near the base.

emotional_tone.description: What the viewer should FEEL when they see this image
emotional_tone.example: Awe at the complexity, curiosity about how the pieces connect, warmth from the organic elements

negative.description: What to explicitly exclude. Always include standard anti-patterns.
negative.default: clay, claymorphic, pastel colors, cartoon, cute, toy, Play-Doh, bright white background, childish, emoji, flat icons, clip art, generic brain illustration, oversaturated single color, stock photo, watermark, blurry text, chrome robot, sterile, cold metallic without organic warmth

thumbnail.name: Thumbnail / Card Image
thumbnail.description: Smaller format for cards, thumbnails, social previews. Must read clearly at small sizes — bold shapes, high contrast, minimal text.

subject.description: Core concept — must be graspable in 1 second at small size

organizing_metaphor.description: Single bold object or scene — simpler than blog-hero

viewpoint.description: Usually straight-on or slight angle for clarity at small size

organic_anchor.description: Even at small size, organic warmth matters — a texture, a glow pattern, a living detail

negative.default: clay, claymorphic, pastel, cartoon, cute, flat icons, clip art, generic brain, stock photo, blurry text, chrome robot, sterile

social-image.name: Social Media Image
social-image.description: Square format for LinkedIn, Twitter, Instagram. Maximum scroll-stop potential. Bold, striking, immediately recognizable as FrankX.

subject.description: The insight or statement this image supports — tied to social post content

organizing_metaphor.description: Bold, iconic — works as a standalone visual statement

organic_anchor.description: Living element that creates emotional connection in the feed

emotional_tone.description: Must create SCROLL-STOP — curiosity, awe, or 'I need to read this'

negative.default: clay, claymorphic, pastel, cartoon, cute, flat icons, clip art, generic brain, stock photo, blurry text, chrome robot, sterile, corporate, boring

product-hero.name: Product Hero Image
product-hero.description: Premium hero for product pages, course landing pages, system overviews. Must convey value and sophistication.

subject.description: The product/system being showcased — what it does, who it's for

organizing_metaphor.description: Must convey mastery and craftsmanship — workshop, laboratory, command center with organic elements

organic_anchor.description: Product images especially need warmth — they sell to humans, not machines

emotional_tone.description: Should convey: 'This is serious craft, built by someone who cares'

negative.default: clay, claymorphic, pastel, cartoon, cute, flat icons, clip art, generic brain, stock photo, blurry text, chrome robot, sterile, cheap, template-looking

mascot-scene.name: Mascot / Character Scene
mascot-scene.description: Character-focused image featuring Axi or other FrankX characters. ORGANIC-FIRST IS PARAMOUNT here — fur before circuits, eyes with character, glow from within.
mascot-scene.organic_first_critical: This template exists because characters are where the organic-first principle matters MOST. A mascot that looks like a chrome robot has completely failed. Reference: mascot-v05-techno-beast-standing.png

subject.description: The character, their pose, their emotional state

viewpoint.description: Character perspective — eye level creates connection, low angle creates power

species_form.description: Base organic form — bear/wolf/fox hybrid, kitsune, creature type

fur_texture.description: Describe the fur/skin FIRST — color, length, sheen, warmth
fur_texture.example: Dense midnight-blue fur with silver-tipped guard hairs catching the light, soft and warm-looking

eyes.description: Eyes convey character — describe intelligence, warmth, emotion
eyes.example: Large amber eyes with vertical pupils, warm intelligence, slight knowing squint

tech_integration.description: How technology is EMBEDDED in the organic form — veins, not armor
tech_integration.example: Faint circuit-trace patterns visible beneath fur on shoulders and spine, glowing soft cyan as if the technology is part of the creature's nervous system

tails.example: Three flowing tails — purple (#AB47C7), cyan (#43BFE3), gold (#F59E0B) — each with bioluminescent tip, moving independently

organic_anchor.description: The CHARACTER ITSELF is the organic anchor, but the environment should also have organic elements

emotional_tone.description: What personality does this character project? Wisdom? Mischief? Calm power?

negative.default: chrome robot, mechanical exoskeleton, armor plating, cute cartoon, chibi, pastel, toy, stuffed animal, plastic, clay, claymorphic, generic AI mascot, no personality in eyes, flat lifeless fur
